languages.text: "Пустотное братство превращается в респектабельную торговую гильдию, Владайм почти избавился от привычек бандита... Да, пока не погиб. Ксавьер превратил Футфол в огромный снаряд, который обрушил на захваченный Уралоном Жестоким Ефрат-II. Тысячи погибли в тот день. Но десятки тысяч Владайм успел эвакуировать, а я — принял{mf||а} на Даргонусе".

"The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "Пустотное братство превращается в респектабельную торговую гильдию, Владайм почти избавился от привычек бандита... Да, пока не погиб. Ксавьер превратил Футфол в огромный снаряд, который обрушил на захваченный Уралоном Жестоким Ефрат-II. Тысячи погибли в тот день. Но десятки тысяч Владайм успел эвакуировать, а я — принял{mf||а} на Даргонусе".

But died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile he crashed into Euphrates-II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

languages.text: « La Communauté du vide est devenue une guilde marchande respectable. Vladaym s'est presque débarrassé de ses habitudes de brigand... Malheureusement, il a péri lorsque Xavier a transformé Castel en un projectile colossal qu'il a lancé sur Euphrate-II après qu'Uralon le Cruel s'en est emparé. Des milliers de gens sont morts ce jour-là, mais Vladaym avait pu en évacuer des dizaines de milliers que j'ai accueillis sur Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: « La Communauté du vide est devenue une guilde marchande respectable. Vladaym s'est presque débarrassé de ses habitudes de brigand... Malheureusement, il a péri lorsque Xavier a transformé Castel en un projectile colossal qu'il a lancé sur Euphrate-II après qu'Uralon le Cruel s'en est emparé. Des milliers de gens sont morts ce jour-là, mais Vladaym avait pu en évacuer des dizaines de milliers que j'ai accueillis sur Dargonus. »
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: «La Hermandad del Vacío se convirtió en un respetable gremio de mercaderes. Vladaym se había deshecho de casi todas sus costumbres más brutales... pero murió cuando Xavier convirtió Paso en un inmenso proyectil y lo lanzó contra Eufrates II después de que cayera en garras de Uralon el Cruel. Miles de personas murieron ese día, pero decenas de miles habían sido evacuadas por Vladaym y encontraron un nuevo hogar en Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: «La Hermandad del Vacío se convirtió en un respetable gremio de mercaderes. Vladaym casi se había deshecho de sus costumbres más brutales... pero murió cuando Xavier convirtió Paso en un inmenso proyectil y lo lanzó contra Eufrates II después de que cayera en garras de Uralon el Cruel. Miles de personas murieron ese día, pero decenas de miles habían sido evacuadas por Vladaym y encontraron un nuevo hogar en Dargonus».
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: “虚空协联成为了受人尊敬的商会，弗拉迪姆也几乎改掉了他那些暴虐的习惯……然而，落脚港后来被残暴者乌拉隆占领。希维尔把落脚港变成了一颗巨大的飞弹，朝欧夫拉茨二号星发射出去。那一天，成百上千的人丧命，弗拉迪姆也死了。他牺牲了自己，疏散了成千上万的民众，那些民众被我安全转移到了达戈努斯。”
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: “虚空协联成为了受人尊敬的商会，弗拉迪姆也几乎改掉了他那些暴虐的习惯……然而，落脚港后来被残暴者乌拉隆占领。希维尔把落脚港变成了一颗巨大的飞弹，朝欧夫拉茨二号星发射出去。那一天，成百上千的人丧命，弗拉迪姆也死了。他牺牲了自己，疏散了成千上万的民众，那些民众被我安全转移到了达戈努斯。”
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: 「虚空の仲間は立派な商人ギルドになった。ヴラダイムはもう少しで悪癖が治るところだったが…しかし、ザビエルがフットフォールを巨大な弾丸に変え、残酷なウラロンンに捕らえられたユーフラテス・IIに墜落させたときに死んだのだ。その日に数千人が死んだ。しかし、ヴラダイムによって数万人が無事に避難し、私は彼らをダルゴナスに迎え入れた」
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: 「虚空の仲間は立派な商人ギルドになった。ヴラダイムはもう少しで悪癖が治るところだったが…しかし、ザビエルがフットフォールを巨大な弾丸に変え、残酷なウラロンンに捕らえられたユーフラテス・IIに墜落させたときに死んだのだ。その日に数千人が死んだ。しかし、ヴラダイムによって数万人が無事に避難し、私は彼らをダルゴナスに迎え入れた」
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Die Gefährten der Leere sind zu einer respektablen Handelsgilde geworden. Vladaym hat sein schurkisches Wesen fast vollständig abgelegt ... Er ist jedoch gestorben, als Xavier Footfall in ein gewaltiges Projektil verwandelt hat, das er in Eufrates II hat rauschen lassen, nachdem es von Uralon dem Grausamen erobert worden war. Tausende sind an diesem Tag gestorben. Aber zehntausende wurden von Vladaym evakuiert, und ich habe sie in Dargonus willkommen geheißen."
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gefährten der Leere sind zu einer respektablen Handelsgilde geworden. Vladaym hat sein schurkisches Wesen fast vollständig abgelegt ... Er ist jedoch gestorben, als Xavier Footfall in ein gewaltiges Projektil verwandelt hat, das er in Eufrates II hat rauschen lassen, nachdem es von Uralon dem Grausamen erobert worden war. Tausende sind an diesem Tag gestorben. Aber zehntausende wurden von Vladaym evakuiert, und ich habe sie in Dargonus willkommen geheißen."
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: "Uçsuz Kardeşliği, saygıdeğer bir tüccar birliğine dönüştü. Vladaym neredeyse tüm serseri hareketlerini bıraktı... Fakat Xavier, Binliman'ı devasa bir silaha dönüştürüp Zalim Uralon tarafından ele geçirilen Eufrates II'ye vurduğunda öldü. O gün binlerce kişi öldü. On binlerce kişi de Vladaym tarafından güvenle tahliye edildi. Onları Dargonus'ta ağırladım."
languages.original_text: "The Fellowship of the Void became a respectable merchant guild. Vladaym shed almost all his thuggish habits... but died when Xavier turned Footfall into a colossal projectile, which he crashed into Eufrates II after it was captured by Uralon the Cruel. Thousands died that day. But tens of thousands were safely evacuated by Vladaym, and I welcomed them to Dargonus."
